mapper.select: SELECT PRODUCT_NAME, TO_CHAR(PRICE, 'FM99,999') AS PRICE_COMMA, MADE_BY, ALCOHOL, FILE_ORG_NAME, FILE_PATH, SELL_ID FROM HANJU_NORMAL_SELL NS INNER JOIN HANJU_PRODUCT P ON P.PRODUCT_ID = NS.PRODUCT_ID LEFT JOIN HANJU_IMAGE I ON P.PRODUCT_ID = I.FK_ID INNER JOIN HANJU_CODE C ON P.TYPE = C.CODE WHERE I.FILE_STATUS = 'T' AND C.PARENT_CODE = 'T'

SELECT PRODUCT_NAME, TO_CHAR(PRICE, 'FM99,999') AS PRICE_COMMA, MADE_BY, ALCOHOL, FILE_ORG_NAME, FILE_PATH, SELL_ID FROM HANJU_NORMAL_SELL NS INNER JOIN HANJU_PRODUCT P ON P.PRODUCT_ID = NS.PRODUCT_ID LEFT JOIN HANJU_IMAGE I ON P.PRODUCT_ID = I.FK_ID INNER JOIN HANJU_CODE C ON P.TYPE = C.CODE
I.FILE_STATUS = 'T'
AND P.TYPE IN
#{item}
AND (ALCOHOL >= 0 AND 10 > ALCOHOL) AND (ALCOHOL >= 10 AND 20 > ALCOHOL) AND (ALCOHOL >= 20 AND 30 > ALCOHOL) AND (ALCOHOL >= 30)
AND (SWEET = 1 OR SWEET = 2) AND (SWEET = 3) AND (SWEET = 4 OR SWEET = 5)
AND (SOUR = 1 OR SOUR = 2) AND (SOUR = 3) AND (SOUR = 4 OR SOUR = 5)
AND (BODY = 1 OR BODY = 2) AND (BODY = 3) AND (BODY = 4 OR BODY = 5)
AND (400 > CAPACITY) AND (CAPACITY >= 400 AND 700 > CAPACITY) AND (CAPACITY >= 700)
AND MATERIAL = '사과' AND MATERIAL = '배' AND MATERIAL = '고구마' AND MATERIAL = '유자' AND MATERIAL LIKE '%딸기%' OR MATERIAL = '복분자' OR MATERIAL LIKE '%베리%' AND MATERIAL = '무화과' AND MATERIAL = '레몬' AND MATERIAL = '복숭아' AND MATERIAL = '단호박' AND MATERIAL NOT LIKE '%베리%' AND MATERIAL NOT IN ('사과', '배', '고구마', '유자', '딸기', '복분자', '무화과', '레몬', '복숭아', '단호박')
AND MADE_BY LIKE '%'||#{madeBy}||'%'
AND NOT (P.TYPE = 'G' OR C.PARENT_CODE = 'W')
SELECT C1.KIND, C2.CODE_NAME, C2.CODE FROM HANJU_CODE C1 INNER JOIN HANJU_CODE C2 ON C1.CODE = C2.PARENT_CODE WHERE C1.KIND = 'IMAGE_STATUS' AND NOT C2.CODE = 'G'

SELECT SUBSTR(MADE_BY, 0, 2) AS MADE_BY FROM HANJU_NORMAL_SELL NS INNER JOIN HANJU_PRODUCT P ON P.PRODUCT_ID = NS.PRODUCT_ID INNER JOIN HANJU_CODE C ON P.TYPE = C.CODE WHERE C.PARENT_CODE = 'T' GROUP BY SUBSTR(MADE_BY, 0, 2) ORDER BY MADE_BY ASC

SELECT PRODUCT_NAME, TO_CHAR(PRICE, 'FM99,999') AS PRICE_COMMA, MADE_BY, ALCOHOL, FILE_ORG_NAME, FILE_PATH, SELL_ID FROM HANJU_NORMAL_SELL NS INNER JOIN HANJU_PRODUCT P ON P.PRODUCT_ID = NS.PRODUCT_ID LEFT JOIN HANJU_IMAGE I ON P.PRODUCT_ID = I.FK_ID INNER JOIN HANJU_CODE C ON P.TYPE = C.CODE WHERE I.FILE_STATUS = 'T' AND P.TYPE = 'G' AND C.PARENT_CODE = 'T'

SELECT PRODUCT_NAME, TO_CHAR(PRICE, 'FM99,999') AS PRICE_COMMA, MADE_BY, ALCOHOL, FILE_ORG_NAME, FILE_PATH, SELL_ID FROM HANJU_NORMAL_SELL NS INNER JOIN HANJU_PRODUCT P ON P.PRODUCT_ID = NS.PRODUCT_ID INNER JOIN HANJU_IMAGE I ON P.PRODUCT_ID = I.FK_ID INNER JOIN HANJU_CODE C ON P.TYPE = C.CODE WHERE I.FILE_STATUS = 'T' AND 10 >= ROWNUM AND NOT C.PARENT_CODE = 'W' ORDER BY NS.SELL_ID DESC
